leads.name: Sarah Reynolds
leads.title: CISO
recentActivity: Published article on 'Zero Trust in Banking Infrastructure'
Migrating core banking microservices to Kubernetes
leads.reason: CISO at large bank with active Kubernetes migration. Their regulatory compliance requirements and container adoption make them an ideal fit for our runtime security solution.
leads.personalizedNotes: Previously worked at JP Morgan Chase where she led cloud-native security initiatives. Has experience with Kubernetes but looking for better runtime protection.

leads.name: Michael Chen
leads.title: DevSecOps Lead
recentActivity: Evaluating runtime security solutions for containers
leads.reason: DevSecOps lead at growing SaaS company with extensive Kubernetes deployments across multiple clouds. Looking for runtime security solutions to address container vulnerabilities.
leads.personalizedNotes: Active in Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) community. Recently presented on container security challenges at KubeCon.

leads.name: Alex Rodriguez
leads.title: Cloud Security Architect
leads.reason: Security architect managing container security for healthcare applications. HIPAA compliance requirements and container adoption make them a strong fit for our solution.
leads.personalizedNotes: Concerned about container runtime protection for applications handling PHI data. Looking for compliance automation tools for Kubernetes.

leads.name: Jessica Wu
leads.title: Security Engineering Manager
recentActivity: Implementing service mesh for zero trust
leads.reason: Leading security engineering at a cloud-native company with 100% Kubernetes infrastructure. Currently evaluating container security solutions with urgent need for runtime protection.
leads.personalizedNotes: Jessica previously implemented our competitor's solution but was unhappy with the performance impact on their production workloads.

leads.name: David Miller
leads.title: VP of Security Operations
leads.reason: Security leader at large retailer in early stages of container adoption. PCI-DSS compliance requirements and growing Kubernetes footprint make them a good fit despite being early in their journey.
leads.personalizedNotes: David is concerned about container security but has limited in-house Kubernetes expertise. Looking for solutions that don't require extensive configuration.

leads.name: Sophia Patel
leads.title: Security Architecture Lead
recentActivity: Implementing zero trust for containerized apps
leads.reason: Security architect at a digital-first insurance company running containerized workloads in production. Looking for comprehensive container security with strong compliance capabilities.
leads.personalizedNotes: Sophia has prior experience with Kubernetes security and understands the challenges of securing containerized applications.

leads.name: James Wilson
leads.title: Information Security Director
recentActivity: Expanding Kubernetes environment for core banking applications
leads.reason: Security leader at financial institution with growing Kubernetes footprint. Strong need for container security that addresses compliance requirements without performance impact.
leads.personalizedNotes: James specifically mentioned runtime security and compliance automation as key requirements in their vendor evaluation criteria.

leads.name: Emily Johnson
leads.title: CISO
leads.reason: Perfect title and company match. High probability of engagement as TechCorp continues to expand their cloud-native architecture and needs comprehensive container protection.
leads.personalizedNotes: Emily has been quoted discussing the challenges of securing dynamic container environments - directly addressed by our platform.

leads.name: Ryan Park
leads.title: Platform Security Lead
recentActivity: Building security for multi-tenant Kubernetes platform
leads.reason: Platform security leader at data analytics company using Kubernetes extensively. Their multi-tenant architecture requires strong isolation and runtime security - perfect fit for our solution.
leads.personalizedNotes: Ryan previously worked with container security solutions and understands the limitations of traditional approaches.

leads.name: Lisa Thompson
leads.title: DevSecOps Manager
recentActivity: Implementing Kubernetes for patient data systems
leads.reason: Security manager at healthcare tech company with growing Kubernetes deployment. Needs container security that addresses both runtime protection and HIPAA compliance requirements.
